title: CMD Snake
description: NO CONNECTION is a game created during the OperaGx Game Jam. Featuring an arcade-like gameplay and a 2 player co-op mode, It was designed to run on web browsers and was entirely made with GameMaker Studio 2, using It's HTML export module.
